title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository: a lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Code Llama, and other large language models locally on macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; identical API surface to the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and chat models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; runs entirely in browser or via Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; idiomatic fluent API, Android compatible.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple OO wrapper around the REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL and shell helper that wraps the Ollama binary with history, syntax highlighting, and prompts.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s UI and shortcuts.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Collection of copy-paste curl snippets for every Ollama REST endpoint, plus Postman collection.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node affinity and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker images and example compose stacks (CPU, CUDA, ROCm) maintained by Ollama team.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri-based desktop GUI for Ollama; cross-platform binary < 10 MB.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLMs into any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that exposes Ollama models via DMs and channel mentions; supports streaming replies.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain in a single Python notebook.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from within notes via custom commands.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama; pinned builds for CUDA, ROCm, and CPU-only on NixOS.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-maintained Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.
